content: Electrical Connector S-BT-ER HL Threaded screw-in stud (Stainless Steel, Metric or Whitworth thread) for electrical connections on steel in highly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ideal for equipotential bonding Enhanced protection against static electricity Enhanced safety – allows electrical current to flow through the stud and then discharges it properly into the base material Suitable for use on most standard steel structures and pipes Stainless steel material provides high corrosion resistance – suitable for use in most industries: marine, offshore, petrochemical and power plant applications Applications Functional bonding Protective bonding Terminal connection Lightning protection Bonding and earthing/grounding For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Point type: Blunt tip Base materials: Steel Corrosion protection: Stainless steel A4(316) or equivalent Technical Data | Point type | Blunt tip | Base materials | Steel | Corrosion protection | Stainless steel A4(316) or equivalent | Environmental conditions | Marine, offshore, petrochemical, power plants, etc. | Material | Duplex stainless steel (1.4462) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2346075 - Elec. connector S-BT-ER W10/15 SN 6 HL - Package Size 100 pc
